revised_title: Etruscan Weights and Coins: A Study of Ancient Antiquities
tldr: The author examines two Etruscan weights or coins, discussing their design, historical context, and significance. The author notes the high antiquity of these pieces and provides insights into their origin, including the use of the Etruscan alphabet. The author also reflects on the importance of these artifacts in understanding the history of ancient Italy.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Archaeology
